Races.Name: Dwarf
Races.Description: Bold, hardy, and resilient, dwarves are renowned for their skill in warfare, mining, and craftsmanship. Their resistance to poison and natural toughness make them exceptional warriors.

Features.Name: Dwarven Resilience
Features.Description: You have advantage on saving throws against poison, and you have resistance against poison damage.

Features.Name: Dwarven Combat Training
Features.Description: You have proficiency with battleaxes, handaxes, light hammers, and warhammers.

Subraces.Name: Gold Dwarf
Subraces.Description: Strong and hardy, gold dwarves are known for their exceptional toughness and endurance.

Features.Name: Dwarven Toughness
Features.Description: Your hit point maximum increases by 1, and it increases by 1 every time you gain a level.

Subraces.Name: Shield Dwarf
Subraces.Description: Warriors and protectors, shield dwarves are trained in the use of armor from a young age.

Features.Name: Dwarven Armor Training
Features.Description: You have proficiency with light and medium armor.

Subraces.Name: Duergar
Subraces.Description: Gray dwarves from the Underdark, duergar possess superior darkvision and enhanced mental resilience from their harsh upbringing.

Features.Name: Superior Darkvision
Features.Description: Your darkvision has a radius of 24 meters.

Features.Name: Duergar Resilience
Features.Description: You have advantage on saving throws against illusions and against being charmed or paralyzed.

Races.Name: Gnome
Races.Description: Small, clever, and energetic, gnomes are natural tinkerers and illusionists. Their innate cunning and magical resistance make them surprisingly resilient.

Features.Name: Gnome Cunning
Features.Description: You have advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws against magic.

Subraces.Name: Forest Gnome
Subraces.Description: At home in the natural world, forest gnomes can communicate with small woodland creatures.

Features.Name: Speak with Animals
Features.Description: You can cast Speak with Animals at will, without expending a spell slot.

Subraces.Name: Rock Gnome
Subraces.Description: Natural inventors and engineers, rock gnomes have an innate understanding of mechanisms and history.

Features.Name: Artificer's Lore
Features.Description: You have proficiency in the History skill. Whenever you make an Intelligence (History) check related to magic items, alchemical objects, or technological devices, you are considered to have expertise in the History skill and add double your proficiency bonus to the check.

Subraces.Name: Deep Gnome
Subraces.Description: Natives of the Underdark, deep gnomes possess superior darkvision and natural camouflage in rocky terrain.

Features.Name: Superior Darkvision
Features.Description: Your darkvision has a radius of 24 meters.

Features.Name: Stone Camouflage
Features.Description: You have advantage on Stealth checks to hide in rocky terrain.

Races.Name: Tiefling
Races.Description: Bearing the mark of their infernal heritage, tieflings combine human ambition with otherworldly power. Their innate magic and fire resistance make them formidable spellcasters.

Features.Name: Hellish Resistance
Features.Description: You have resistance to fire damage.

Subraces.Name: Asmodeus Tiefling
Subraces.Description: Descended from the archdevil Asmodeus, you command the magic of darkness and fire.

Features.Name: Infernal Legacy
Features.Description: You know the Produce Flame cantrip.

Features.Name: Infernal Legacy
Features.Description: You can cast Hellish Rebuke once per long rest.

Features.Name: Infernal Legacy
Features.Description: You can cast Darkness once per long rest.

Subraces.Name: Mephistopheles Tiefling
Subraces.Description: Descended from the archdevil Mephistopheles, you wield arcane flame with deadly precision.

Features.Name: Infernal Legacy
Features.Description: You know the Mage Hand cantrip.

Features.Name: Infernal Legacy
Features.Description: You can cast Burning Hands once per long rest.

Features.Name: Infernal Legacy
Features.Description: You can cast Flame Blade once per long rest.

Subraces.Name: Zariel Tiefling
Subraces.Description: Descended from the archdevil Zariel, you channel divine wrath and smiting power.

Features.Name: Infernal Legacy
Features.Description: You know the Thaumaturgy cantrip.

Features.Name: Infernal Legacy
Features.Description: You can cast Searing Smite once per long rest.

Features.Name: Infernal Legacy
Features.Description: You can cast Branding Smite once per long rest.

Races.Name: Githyanki
Races.Description: Warriors from the Astral Plane, githyanki are fierce raiders and expert combatants. Their psionic abilities and martial prowess make them deadly opponents.

Features.Name: Martial Prodigy
Features.Description: You have proficiency with shortswords, longswords, and greatswords.

Features.Name: Githyanki Armor Proficiency
Features.Description: You have proficiency with light and medium armor.

Features.Name: Astral Knowledge
Features.Description: You can tap into the collective knowledge of your people. You gain proficiency in all skills associated with a chosen ability score until your next long rest.

Features.Name: Githyanki Psionics
Features.Description: You know the Mage Hand cantrip. When you cast it with this trait, the hand is invisible.

Features.Name: Githyanki Psionics
Features.Description: You can cast Enhance Leap once per long rest.

Features.Name: Githyanki Psionics
Features.Description: You can cast Misty Step once per long rest.

Races.Name: Dragonborn
Races.Description: Born of dragons, dragonborn walk proudly through a world that greets them with fearful incomprehension. Each dragonborn's breath and scales are tied to a specific dragon ancestry.

Subraces.Name: Black Dragonborn
Subraces.Description: Your draconic ancestry is tied to black dragons, granting you mastery over acid.

Features.Name: Draconic Resistance
Features.Description: You have resistance to acid damage.

Features.Name: Breath Weapon
Features.Description: You can use your action to exhale destructive acid energy in a line.

Subraces.Name: Blue Dragonborn
Subraces.Description: Your draconic ancestry is tied to blue dragons, granting you mastery over lightning.

Features.Name: Draconic Resistance
Features.Description: You have resistance to lightning damage.

Features.Name: Breath Weapon
Features.Description: You can use your action to exhale destructive lightning energy in a line.

Subraces.Name: Brass Dragonborn
Subraces.Description: Your draconic ancestry is tied to brass dragons, granting you mastery over fire.

Features.Name: Draconic Resistance
Features.Description: You have resistance to fire damage.

Features.Name: Breath Weapon
Features.Description: You can use your action to exhale destructive fire energy in a line.

Features.Name: Draconic Resistance
Features.Description: You have resistance to lightning damage.

Features.Name: Breath Weapon
Features.Description: You can use your action to exhale destructive lightning energy in a line.

Features.Name: Draconic Resistance
Features.Description: You have resistance to acid damage.

Features.Name: Breath Weapon
Features.Description: You can use your action to exhale destructive acid energy in a line.

Subraces.Description: Your draconic ancestry is tied to gold dragons, granting you mastery over fire.

Features.Name: Draconic Resistance
Features.Description: You have resistance to fire damage.

Features.Name: Breath Weapon
Features.Description: You can use your action to exhale destructive fire energy in a cone.

Features.Name: Draconic Resistance
Features.Description: You have resistance to poison damage.

Features.Name: Breath Weapon
Features.Description: You can use your action to exhale destructive poison energy in a cone.

Subraces.Name: Red Dragonborn
Subraces.Description: Your draconic ancestry is tied to red dragons, granting you mastery over fire.

Features.Name: Draconic Resistance
Features.Description: You have resistance to fire damage.

Features.Name: Breath Weapon
Features.Description: You can use your action to exhale destructive fire energy in a cone.

Subraces.Name: Silver Dragonborn
Subraces.Description: Your draconic ancestry is tied to silver dragons, granting you mastery over cold.

Features.Name: Draconic Resistance
Features.Description: You have resistance to cold damage.

Features.Name: Breath Weapon
Features.Description: You can use your action to exhale destructive cold energy in a cone.

Subraces.Name: White Dragonborn
Subraces.Description: Your draconic ancestry is tied to white dragons, granting you mastery over cold.

Features.Name: Draconic Resistance

Features.Name: Breath Weapon
